eng: ⓪ is the case in a temporally discontinuous way.
⓪ has been the case [perfect / retrospective aspect].
Ⓧ is me and has property ①
Ⓧ is, are you, you all (all the addressees, singular or plural, but not associative), and have property ①.
Ⓘ is/are the one(s) named [remaining of the word, starting on the prominent syllable].
Ⓘ is/are the referents of the variable named [remaining of the word, starting on the prominent syllable].
Ⓧ is/are the one(s) named after property ①
Ⓐ causes, makes ⓪ be the case.
Ⓧ is you-know-what and has property ①
Ⓧ is this thing (which I a pointing at or am otherwise singling out ostensibly) having property ①
I and you are Ⓧ and have property ①.
the referents of the closest noun phrase marked with the Pendent case satisfy property ①.
Ⓧ is mine and has property ①.
Ⓧ is yours and has property ①.
Ⓧ, together with certain recognizable ones associated with it/him/her/them, satisfy property ①.
Ⓐ is the truth value of proposition ⓪.
Ⓧ is related to what has property ①.
Ⓧ is among what has property ①.
Ⓧ, which is one in number, ①s.
Ⓧ are more than one things, collectively having property ①.
Ⓧ is all that has property ①.
Ⓧ is a group, aggregate of things having property ①.
Ⓧ is a spatiotemporally bounded chunk of the (boundless) material that has property ①.
Ⓐ are in the reciprocal relationship ② ; Ⓐ ② each other.
Ⓧ is a part of what has property ①
Ⓧ ②s a great number relatively to the median among Ⓐ.
Ⓧ ②s a great number relatively to the median among Ⓐ, the former being one of them.
Ⓧ ②s a small number relatively to the median among Ⓐ.
Ⓧ ②s a very great number relatively to the median among Ⓐ.
Ⓧ ②s a very small number relatively to the median among Ⓐ.
Ⓧ ②s an average number relatively to the median among Ⓐ.
Ⓧ intends, plans to have property ①.
what has property Ⓧ has property ①.
Ⓧ pertains to [#1] and have property ①.
➊ is true, is the case.
➊ is false, isn’t the case.
➊ are in relation ➋ with differen things.
➊ are in recipriocal relation ➋.
➊ and ➋ are in binary relation ⦃DP⦄.
➊, ➋ and ➌ are in ternary relation ⦃DP⦄.
➊, ➋, ➌ and ➍ are in quaternary relation ⦃DP⦄.
➊ and ➋ are both the case.
having property ➊ is frequent, common among what has property ➋.
➊ is more than one in number.
➊ suffers, feels pain at locus ➋.
➊ feels loves, affection towards ➋.
➊ computes that ➋ is the answer to what has property ➌.
➊ is computing the answer to what has property ➋.
➊ is the here and now (my here and now), this expanse of spacetime within which I am communicating this message to you.
➊ has duration, lasts for ➋.
➊ has a size of ➋, the distance between the two points on it which are farthest apart.
➊ uses, manipulates, exercises influence upon ➋ in order to achieve the goal of satisfying property ➌.
➊ displays to ➋ property ➌.
➊ says to ➋ utterance ➌.
I now assert to you that ➊ is the case.
➊ asserts that ➋ is the case.
➊ asserts to ➋ that ➌ is the case.
➊ is a leaf (of a plant).
➊ is an ear (including outer and inner ear).
➊ is a fingernail, a toenail, a claw or a hoof.
➊ is a flower (plant reproductive organ).
➊ is a patch of hairs; ➊ is fur (not necessarily of a dead animal).
➊ is a muzzle or snout (body part).
➊ is a root (of a plant).
➊ is dead, is a dead body, a cadaver.
➊ is water (in any physical state).
➊ is made for the function of being such that something is in relation ➋ with the former.
➊ is a mountain or hill.
➊ happens at the same time as ➋; ➊ is simultaneous with ➋.
➊ gives to ➋ property ➌.
➊ is the case along/together with ➋.
➊ goes from ➋ to ➌.
➊ is wet with liquid ➋.
➊ waits for ➋ to be the case.
➊ finds ➋ beautiful (not necessarily visually).
➊ is okay with, doesn't mind ➋ being the case.
➊ is a typical cuckoo (Cuculus genus).
➊ belongs to the Corvus genus (ravens, crows, jackdaws, rooks).
➊ jokingly asserts that ➋ is the case.
➊ reads, decypher symbolic code ➋ as encoding data ➌.
➊ understands, interprets the meaning of ➋ as being ➌.
➊ finds ➋ very likely, expects it to be true, has confidence in it being the case.
➊ greets ➋, expressing well-intentionedness and acknowledgement of presence. ⸨Used upon encounter but not upon parting.⸩
➊ verbally requests attention from ➋ in order to initiate communication.
➊ interprets visual quale ➋ as inducing information ➌ (proposition).
➊ interprets quale ➋ as inducing proposition ➌.
➊ is a day (event of a daytime-nighttime cycle).
➊ is a day (duration of a daytime-nighttime cycle).
➊ and ➋ are separated by temporal distance ➌.
